body.description: Pigmentclar Brightening Foaming Cream Facial Cleanser Product Technology Pigmentclar Brightening Foaming Cream Facial Cleanser was designed to be an effective, yet gentle deep cleanser with deep cleansing agents in a soft foaming cream to purify skin from dirt and debris*. Formulated with: non-particle, non-bead Lipo-Hydroxy Acid (LHA) to help shed dark cells from skins surface and clear away dullness. *Confirmed by L'Oréal Active Cosmetics Division & La Roche-Posay, 2020 Dermatologist Tested Allergy Tested Suitable for Sensitive Skin Instantly, skin is deeply cleansed and skin clarity is enhanced Skin looks brighter and smoother and is soft, supple and comfortable Day after day, skin is more radiant and eventoned

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Pigmentclar Collection For Visible Dark Spots. La Roche-Posay's Pigmentclar product collection contains a powerful complex of ingredients to brighten skin and reduce the appearance of dark spots*. *Confirmed by L'Oréal Active Cosmetics Division & La Roche-Posay, 2020 Pigmentclar Brightening Foaming Cream Facial Cleanser Product Technology Pigmentclar Brightening Foaming Cream Facial Cleanser was designed to be an effective, yet gentle deep cleanser with deep cleansing agents in a soft foaming cream to purify skin from dirt and debris*. Formulated with: non-particle, non-bead Lipo-Hydroxy Acid (LHA) to help shed dark cells from skins surface and clear away dullness. *Confirmed by L'Oréal Active Cosmetics Division & La Roche-Posay, 2020 Dermatologist Tested Allergy Tested Suitable for Sensitive Skin Instantly, skin is deeply cleansed and skin clarity is enhanced Skin looks brighter and smoother and is soft, supple and comfortable Day after day, skin is more radiant and eventoned

Foaming Cream Cleanser This anti-aging cleanser helps remove impurities and brighten skin tone. Formulated with micro-exfoliating lipo-hydroxy acid (LHA) it's a derivative of salicylic acid, and has exfoliating and skin surface renewing properties and is ideal for dull and even skin tone. Glycerin helps hydrate skin by absorbing water from the surrounding environment. How to Use Use morning and evening, lather with water. Massage face gently & rinse thoroughly with water. Use in association with SPF protection. Dermatological Expertise La Roche-Posay is committed to making dermatological skin care accessible to those who need it, by partnering with dermatologists from the development to the recommendation of our skin care products. We are committed to offering highly effective products that can be tolerated by even sensitive skin Benefits & Texture Brightening cleanser for dull, uneven skin that revives skin radiance immediately. Skin feels soft, supple and comfortable. Over time, the skin appears brighter and smoother. Rich and easy-to-rinse foaming texture.

Pigmentclar Brightening Foaming Cleanser Pigmentclar Brightening Serum La Roche-Posay Hyalu B5 Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum La Roche Posay Glycolic Acid Serum Toleriane Ultra Moisturizing Cream Anthelios Tinted Mineral Sunscreen Ingredients Micro-exfoliating lipo-hydroxy acid (LHA), glycerin and thermal water Phe-Resorcinol and Ferulic Acid, Lipo-Hydroxy Acid (LHA) Pure Hyaluronic Acid, Madecassoside & Vitamin B5 10% Glycolic Acid, TXA & Kojic Acid + Vitamin B5 Shea Butter, Neurosensine, Thermal Spring Water Cell-Ox Shield Technology (provides broad spectrum UVA/ UVB Protection + Antioxidants). 100% Mineral Formula with Titanium Dioxide. Skin Concern Dull and even skin tone Dark spots, uneven tone Fine lines, loss of volume and elasticity, dehydration Visible Dark Spots, Discolorations and Uneven Skin Tone Ultra sensitive skin Daily sun protection Benefit Deep cleanser revives skin radiance immediately for brighter, smoother skin Visibly reduces the look of dark spots. Brightens and evens complexion Soothes, replenishes moisture & hydrates dehydrated skin Reduce the look of dark spots & discolorations + reveals visibly brighter, even looking skin Intensely hydrates and helps restore skin’s hydration level to calm and soothe 100% Mineral, Universal tinted shade for a healthy glow, for all skin types, including sensitive skin, UVA/UVB protection, non whitening Suggested Use Use morning and evening, lather with water. Massage face gently & rinse thoroughly with water. Morning and evening before moisturizer Apply 3-4 drops in the morning and evening Apply 3-4 drops in the evening followed by SPF protection in the morning. Morning and night after cleansing Use as last step in routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using for years - tiny amount goes a LONG LONG way
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this La Roche-Posay Pigmentclar Brightening Face Cleanser for years probably close to a decade. I started using this along with their other products in their brightening line to help with my severe hyperpigmentation (mostly due to sun damage). It is magically AMAZING how incredibly foamy this becomes once applied with warm water (or whatever choice temperature you choose). You ONLY need a pea sized amount of soap, even LESS to wash your face. Im 58, and have combination skin. This leaves my face squeaky clean and somewhat taut, but somehow does not dry out my skin. It just creates a beautiful base for my toners, serums and moisturizers. I could see how some might find this drying so unsure if how this would work for very dry or sensitive skin. When used with the brand’s Pigmentar Serum Visible Dark Spot Reducer I saw definite results in reduction of several dark spots on my face. However consistency is the key as well as patience. I saw results in approx 6-8 wow which is typically ideal for effective skin care. Erno Laslo iconic “black bar” soap, my 2nd favorite cleanser, is similar as to how this cleanser leaves my skin feeling. However, LaRoche-Posay will always be my first go to. It gives me the luxe high end results I receive from my Erno Laszlo soap at an amazing price, due to the fact the Pigmentclar cleanser always, ALWAYS lasts me a super long time. Highly recommend this cleanser as well as the brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have recently s started using this on my face and have just finished the first bottle and will definately continue using this! My face feels soft and so clean after using this and I have started to notice the REAL difference in my face that seems to look less blotchy, lighter brown spots, and just a smoother look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gently Exfoliates and Brightens Skin
reviews.reviewText: Love this cleanser and how it’s improved my skin! Aging skin needs to be gently exfoliated to prevent dullness. This cleanser keeps my skin looking brighter, feeling soft, and smooth. I have dry sensitive skin, but this cleanser doesn’t leave my skin feeling irritated or tight after cleansing. My dark spots have lightened and my pores appear smaller! I’m very pleased with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars DOES THE JOB AND BETTER THAN EXPECTED
reviews.reviewText: Ive used this for a couple weeks now and this is what i have noticed. You only need half a pea sized amount and emulsify it in between your hands then apply to damp face. I used to have very uneven skin-tone and reddened face due to daily retin A cream use and this has not only evened out my skin-tone but also brightened it a bit. I also have extremely dry skin and i found that this actually did not make my face as dry as when i was using cera ve moisturizing cleanser (which is kind of ironic). Does a absolutely amazing job definitely recommend just be patient with results!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t noticed a difference with skin brightness but this product has made my skin more hydrated.A small amount goes a very long way and it smells amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure what to think about this at first, turns out I was using too much product. Only need a little!! This does not irritate my skin but like most new skincare items, my skin takes time to get used to it. My face feels super clean after using!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brighter cleanser for face
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff anything from LaRoch-Posay is EXCELLENT you only need a little bit I will buy this again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magic for your face
reviews.reviewText: Brightens, lightens, and gives your face life
